Articles.Content: Does anyone have the coordinates for the crashed saucer on the Mun? I don't use Mechjeb, so won't be flying there on autopilot. Rather, I'd like to fly somewhere in the vicinity and then send out a rover to do a more specific search. At the moment I have Jeb out on a recce in the rough area of where I believe it to be, but being so southerly and the weak sunlight, he is literally stumbling around in the dark. He is currently at 65 54 16 S, 67 49 26 W but I haven't got a clue which direction to send him next to get closer or, if he is still some way off, whether he needs to return to his ship to do a short hop.

Don't worry, I found it in 0.20 where the sparkly pixel syndrome is more prominent.

ETA: How do you change the status to Answered?

Edited August 2, 2013 by Scarecrow88

I think you have to edit the first post and then change the title from there.

Cheers!

It is a lot easier to find anomalies in 0.20...just yesterday I used it to find the Armstrong Memorial. Sat a rover next to it, did some other things, switched back to my rover, suffered a Kraken attack...........
